name: Portent
description: You create a strand of space time, looking into the immediate future of a creature within a short (10 unit) distance. You watch the creature take a complete turn and whatever aftermath occurs within 1 round. When the spell ends, the passage of time is reverted, bringing you back to the present.
charge: You can see potential consequences of the turn the target took within a minute. Combat situations, or scenarios with many consequences will not give a clear future.
